derivation.yuyuan_name: so named because the wood was formerly used to make ‘dogs’ (i.e. skewers)

entry.def: A dogwood is a tree or bush that has groups of small white flowers surrounded by four large leaves.

means.word_mean: 1. a tree of shrub of the genus Cornus often having showy bracts resembling flowers
2. hard tough wood of any dogwood of the genus Cornus; resemble boxwood
